subprocess_flow.description: The Inventory Manager assesses the criticality of the stock-out based on pre-defined criteria, such as product demand, potential lost sales, customer impact, and strategic importance of the product.
outputs: Determination of stock-out criticality (critical or not critical)
success_criteria: Stock-out criticality is determined based on pre-defined criteria

subprocess_flow.description: If the stock-out is deemed critical and requires additional approval based on company policy (e.g., exceeding a certain dollar amount), the Inventory Manager obtains the necessary approvals from the designated approvers (e.g., senior management).
success_criteria: All required approvals are obtained according to company policy

subprocess_flow.description: Using the mobile solution, the Inventory Manager initiates an emergency purchase order for the out-of-stock product, specifying the required quantity and desired delivery date.
success_criteria: Emergency purchase order is initiated with accurate product and quantity information

subprocess_flow.description: The Inventory Manager selects an expedited shipping option from a pre-approved list of suppliers offering expedited services, ensuring the fastest possible delivery time.
success_criteria: An appropriate expedited shipping option is selected to minimize delivery time

subprocess_flow.description: The inventory management system automatically generates the complete purchase order based on the information provided by the Inventory Manager, including product details, quantity, shipping instructions, and selected supplier.
success_criteria: A complete and accurate purchase order is automatically generated

subprocess_flow.description: The Inventory Manager sends an automatic notification to the Purchasing Department, alerting them to the urgent need to process the emergency purchase order.
success_criteria: Purchasing Department is successfully notified of the emergency purchase order

subprocess_flow.description: The Inventory Manager formally submits the emergency purchase order to the Purchasing Department for processing, ensuring that all required information is included.
outputs: Emergency purchase order submitted to the Purchasing Department
success_criteria: Emergency purchase order is formally submitted to the Purchasing Department
